holidays.title: Atheist Day
holidays.description: The significance of Atheist Day is that all beliefs or the lack thereof must be respected.

holidays.title: Chips and Dip Day
holidays.description: Enjoy your favorite snack, chips and dip, to celebrate the day properly.

holidays.title: Cuddly Kitten Day
holidays.description: Delve into everything cat, from fun facts, to how they were domesticated, and more.

holidays.title: Day of the Liberation of Southern Africa
holidays.description: Let us all rejoice and celebrate freedom as we learn more about South Africa's liberation.

holidays.title: Erev Purim
holidays.description: Let us celebrate Erev Purim by filling our Purim baskets with love and joy.

holidays.title: Esther Fast
holidays.description: Esther Fast is practiced as a way of developing willpower and gaining divine favor.

holidays.title: Melba Toast Day
holidays.description: It all started with a chef who was enamored by an Australian opera singer.

holidays.title: National Alice Day
holidays.description: National Alice Day is observed every year to celebrate people named Alice.

holidays.title: National Chia Day
holidays.description: They are small, mighty seeds known as one of the rare superfoods on the planet.

holidays.title: National Chip and Dip Day
holidays.description: National Chip and Dip Day, celebrated annually on March 23, celebrates an all-American crowd-pleaser! Who doesn’t love a tasty chip-and-dip combo? It would be tough…

holidays.title: National Jacob Day
holidays.description: Hi there, Jacob. Today is your day, so let’s find out more about your name!

holidays.title: National Tamale Day
holidays.description: Indulge your cravings and treat yourself to some tamales this National Tamale Day!

holidays.title: Near Miss Day
holidays.description: What would you do if a huge asteroid was about to hit planet Earth?

holidays.title: OK Day
holidays.description: Explore the history, popularity, and really cool facts about the word 'OK.'

holidays.title: Otago Anniversary Day
holidays.description: We have all you need to know about Otago and its anniversary.

holidays.title: Pakistan Day
holidays.description: Can you believe that over 15 million people migrated in the summer of 1947!

holidays.title: Ravenclaw Pride Day
holidays.description: Your guide to everything Ravenclaw, from its interesting (and tragic) history to its most famous students.

holidays.title: Walk in the Sand Day
holidays.description: Head to the beach, kick off your shoes, and let the sand caress your feet.

holidays.title: World Math Day
holidays.description: Do you have what it takes to be the last Mathlete standing this World Math Day?

holidays.title: World Meteorological Day
holidays.description: Hard to imagine a time when we didn’t know how the weather was going to be.

holidays.title: Joan Crawford’s Birthday
holidays.description: The hiccups Crawford faced were the stepping stones to the success of this dynamite talent.

holidays.title: KarinaOMG’s Birthday
holidays.description: It took creativity and focus for Karina to venture into the realm of famous YouTubers.

holidays.title: Kyrie Irving’s Birthday
holidays.description: With an opportunity to succeed, he slam-dunked his efforts into life's pool of riches.

holidays.title: Quando Rondo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Tougher than the rap game, Quando Rando is determined to rise in the spotlight.

holidays.title: Renjun’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this exceptional singer, his legacy is set in stone and written in the stars.
